title: With Ray Rice Video, TMZ Remains King Of Celebrity Wrong-Doing
teaser: The Ray Rice video wasn't the first time TMZ has jolted the media world with raw videos or documents demonstrating celebrity wrong-doing. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with BuzzFeed's Anne Helen Petersen.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
